articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Wednesday, the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of KPA supreme commandership.
					 He entered the hall where the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 The head of the guard of honor of the KPA Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute towards the statues.
					
					 Placed at the statues were a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un and a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid a high tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then he entered the hall of immortality where Generalissimo Kim Jong Il lies in state. He, together with other visitors, made bow to the Generalissimo in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He went round halls that house train coaches and cars used by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their lifetime, the mourning hall, the room where the orders Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls that house an electric car and a boat he used in his lifetime.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong, Kim Jong Gak, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song and other KPA commanding officers and commanding officers of all services and units of corps level of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Letter of Thanks to Widow of Ex-President Kim Dae Jung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Letter of Thanks to Widow of Ex-President Kim Dae Jung
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a letter of thanks to Ri Hui Ho, widow of ex-president Kim Dae Jung, on Dec. 18.
					 Kim Jong Un in the letter expressed his heartfelt thanks to Ri Hui Ho for sending a wreath and letter of condolences with sincerity on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of the demise of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC).
					
					 He said he thought that it was an expression of noble obligation for Comrade Chairman of the NDC that Ri expressed condolences before the bier of Comrade Chairman of the NDC by visiting Pyongyang with her sons and daughter-in-law at the national funeral three years ago and sent a wreath and letter of condolences on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il often recalled in his lifetime Ri's total devotion of all her efforts to the nation and the reunification together with ex-president Kim Dae Jung.
					
					 He expressed his will to make positive efforts to realize the long-cherished desire for national reunification in the future, too, true to the noble will of reunification of the preceding top leaders and their lifelong cause.
					
					 He expected Ri to surely visit Pyongyang in a good season next year and have good time, having a rest.
					
					 He hoped she would take particular care of herself in cold winter weather.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Thanks to Chairwoman of Hyundai Group
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Thanks to Chairwoman of Hyundai Group
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a letter of thanks to Hyon Jong Un, chairwoman of Hyundai Group, on Dec. 18. 
					 Kim Jong Un in the letter said that he was grateful to Hyon for sending a wreath and letter of condolences with sincerity on the 3rd anniversary of demise of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission.
					
					 She visited the bier of Kim Jong Il to express condolences when the DPRK people were in grief over his sudden demise, the letter stressed, adding the wreath and message were a clear manifestation of her intention to value and keep the close relations generation after generation the NDC chairman had with former honorary Chairman Jong Ju Yong and former Chairman Jong Mong Hon. 
					
					 All Koreans will remember the patriotic feats of Jong Ju Yong and Jong Mong Hon for the nation and reunification, it noted. 
					
					 It wished her always success in her work. 
					
					 It said that she would be welcomed if she visits Pyongyang in the future.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Letters of Thanks to Widow of Ex-President Kim Dae Jung and Chairwoman of Hyundai Group
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Letters of Thanks to Widow of Ex-President Kim Dae Jung and Chairwoman of Hyundai Group
						
 Kaesong, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, sent letters of thanks to Ri Hui Ho, widow of ex-president Kim Dae Jung and Hyon Jong Un, chairwoman of Hyundai Group, who sent wreaths and letters of condolences in deep memory of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.
					 Kim Yang Gon, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, separately and courteously handed the letters over to Kim Song Jae, director of the Kim Dae Jung Peace Center, and Hyon Jong Un in Kaesong on Wednesday.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of A Just Russia
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of A Just Russia
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from S. M. Mironov, chairman of A Just Russia, on Nov. 27.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend the deepest consolation to you on behalf of A Just Russia and on my own behalf on the occasion of the third anniversary of the sudden demise of the great leader of the Korean people Comrade Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il was the excellent leader of the Korean people as he inspired and organized their achievements and victories.
					
					 Close relations that conform to the spirit of state relations between the DPRK and the Russian Federation have been established between the WPK that had been led by Comrade Kim Jong Il for decades and A Just Russia.
					
					 I expect that cooperation between our two countries and between A Just Russia and the WPK will substantially develop in the future, too, in the interests of our two friendly states and peoples.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., Congolese Party of Labor
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., Congolese Party of Labor
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from Pierre Ngolo, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Congolese Party of Labor, on Dec. 17.
					 The message said the Congolese Party of Labor are remembering the unforgettable feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, for all the Korean people and progressive mankind on the occasion of the third anniversary of his sudden demise. 
					
					 The message continued:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, who remained unfailingly loyal to the country and its people and the Korean revolution, devoted his whole life to carrying forward and accomplishing the cause of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He, the wise thinker and theoretician, developed and enriched the Songun idea founded by Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The successful embodiment of the Songun idea has made it possible for the DPRK to shatter all moves to isolate and suffocate it.
					
					 We are witnessing with joy the Korean people who are dynamically advancing under the unfurled banner of Songun under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un, who is carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the great preceding leaders by converting great sorrow into strength and courage.
					
					 The Congolese Party of Labor and its members will as ever support the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to carry out the grand plan.
					
					 Wishing Kim Jong Un great achievements in the great work to lead the Korean people to the building of a peaceful and thriving nation, the general secretary said that he would like to reaffirm his will to strengthen friendship and solidarity between the two parties and two peoples.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of National Council of Communist Party of India
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of National Council of Communist Party of India
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from S. Sudhakar Reddy, general secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, on Dec. 17.
					 The message said that the National Council of the Communist Party of India extended regards to Comrade Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 We will remember the feats performed by him for the strengthening of the Workers' Party of Korea and socialist construction in the DPRK.
					
					 His initiative for Korea's reunification enjoys absolute support from the international community.
					
					 We are recollecting the feats performed by him in the struggle for peace, democracy and social progress and against the imperialist forces and are convinced that the cause started by him will be successfully carried forward under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government.

articles.title: Notice to President of S. Korean Red Cross
articles.content:
Notice to President of S. Korean Red Cross
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- A relevant institution of the DPRK intercepted south Korean inhabitant Ma Sang Ho, 52, who illegally entered the area of the DPRK side late in November.
					 Ma admitted his illegal entry into the country and earnestly requested to let him live in the DPRK as the south side restricts his freedom, while treating him as a mentally deranged person.
					
					 We have decided to persuade him into going back to where his parents live from humanitarian point of view.
					
					 In this regard the chairman of the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK on Dec. 24 sent a notice to the president of the south Korean Red Cross, informing him that it will hand over the south Korean inhabitant to the south side through Panmunjom on Dec. 26.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- All service personnel and people of the DPRK are extending highest tribute and eternal glory to the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu on December 24, the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), people from all walks of life, school youth and children here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the KPISF, institutions, enterprises, factories, farms and schools at all levels, bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The participants made bows to the statues in humblest reverence.
					
					 Laid before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, the Mansudae Art Studio and other places in Pyongyang and before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were floral baskets in the name of KPA units, institutions and enterprises, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their residential quarters to pay floral tribute to them.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Wednesday, the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae and other leading officials of the party and state and officials of the party and power bodies, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Also seen there was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Placed there was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The visitors paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 At the immortality halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, the visitors made bows to them in humblest reverence.
					
					 They went round halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display, the mourners' hall and halls that house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at KPA Large Combined Unit
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at KPA Large Combined Unit
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected at the Command of Large Combined Unit 526 of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on significant December 24.
					 A ceremony of unveiling the statues took place Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil and other KPA commanding officers, service personnel and employees of the large combined unit, families of service personnel and officials of those units that contributed to the erection and persons of distinguished services.
					
					 Leading officials of the army and commanding officers of the large combined unit unveiled the statues.
					
					 The moment, the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, symbols of victory and glory of Songun Korea, appeared to shine in sunlight amid the thunderous shouts of "hurrah!" and release of balloons that brilliantly decorated the sky over the venue of the ceremony.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA, was placed before the statues.
					
					 Also placed were floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the NDC of the DPRK and in the name of Large Combined Unit 526 of the KPA.
					
					 Also laid were floral baskets in the name of the KPA General Political Bureau, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the KPA General Staff, units at all levels under the large combined unit and units associated with the leadership feats of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues in the humblest reverence.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So who is director of the KPA General Political Bureau, made an address.
					
					 He said Kim Il Sung personally organized the large combined unit during the grim period of war and dispatched anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters as commanding officers, making sure that the unit would be developed into combat ranks of a match-for-a hundred fighters who will emerge victorious in battles with any formidable enemies.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il provided energetic leadership to turn all posts into impregnable fortresses, while underscoring the crucial importance of the duty of the large combined unit.
					
					 The ardent desire of the service personnel of the unit to have the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il erected and to convey to posterity their leadership feats was realized thanks to Kim Jong Un, the speaker said.
					
					 He called for rallying closer around Kim Jong Un and working hard to bring earlier the day when the revolutionary cause of Songun that had been pushed forward by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is brilliantly accomplished.
					
					 The participants looked round the statues after being briefed on them.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country on Dec. 24, the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The events at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Arch of Triumph, etc. in Pyongyang began with the playing of the song "General of Korea."
					
					 The participants danced to the tune of songs "Our General Is the Best," "We Will Hold Our General in High Esteem," etc. in profound reverence for Kim Jong Il, peerless brilliant commander, who led the Korean revolution along the glorious road of victory, braving the severe ordeals and trials of history through his original Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 They hardened their will to become reliable human fortresses and shields devotedly defending Marshal Kim Jong Un in the same revolutionary spirit as was displayed by Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, who provided a brilliant tradition of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 The cheerful melodies of "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" and other songs reverberated far and wide at the venues of the dancing parties, revving up the atmosphere.
					
					 On the same day, dancing parties took place in the seats of all provinces, cities and counties.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble at the Ponghwa Art Theatre on Wednesday, the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, overseas Koreans, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here and their wives.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as chorus "General Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot", male trio "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas", male solo and dance "Red Chol Pass" and women's large chorus "We Long for You".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the proud course covered by the great Paektusan nation which has won victory after victory while going along the immutable orbit of independence, Songun and socialism, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem at the helm of the revolutionary armed forces and glorifying the history and traditions of victory.
					
					 Female sextet "Arirang Resounded in Jiansanfeng" deepened the reverence for anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who is always alive as the ray of the sun.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers reflecting the pride and optimism of the service personnel.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Marked in Different Parts
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Marked in Different Parts 
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Art performances took place Wednesday in various parts of the DPRK to celebrate the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The artistes of the National Symphony Orchestra gave a concert "Our General Is the Best" at the Moranbong Theater.
					
					 Put on the stage were orchestras "Thinking of the General", "Attraction", "General on a Galloping White Horse", "Unforgettable Echoes over Lagoon Samil" and other numbers.
					
					 Acrobats of the National Circus gave a performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 The performance that presented mysterious balance with virtuosity and dynamic rhythms instilled optimism and enthusiasm into young and other people on the anniversaries.
					
					 Similar performances took place in different parts of the country including North Phyongan, North Hwanghae, Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Women's Union Visit Kim Jong Suk's Birthplace
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Women's Union Visit Kim Jong Suk's Birthplace
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea visited anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk's birthplace in Hoeryong and revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in various places on the occasion of the 97th anniversary of her birth.
					 They laid floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk and mosaics depicting her in Chongjin City and Hoeryong City of North Hamgyong Province, the Rangrim Revolutionary Battle Site of Jagang Province and the Sinpha Revolutionary Site of Ryanggang Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They toured her birthplace in Hoeryong on Dec. 23.
					
					 They held a meeting before starting for the birthplace before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. And they looked round revolutionary sites in Chongjin City including lodging quarters of Haebang-dong, photo studio and house of revolutionary comrade-in arms.
					
					 They went to the birthplace at the foot of Osan Hill on Dec. 24 and looked round historic relics preserved in the historic house with good care, being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Suk was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family and grew up to be a revolutionary.
					
					 They also went round Hoeryong Revolutionary Museum and Mangyang Ferry. 
					
					 They held a meeting before the statue of Kim Jong Suk. They expressed the pledge of the Korean women in the Songun era to firmly carry forward the shining tradition of devotedly defending the leader provided by Kim Jong Suk and dynamically carry on the struggle for the bright future of the great Paektusan nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Officials and members of women's union in North Hamgyong Province went to the revolutionary battle sites in the Yonsa area.
					
					 Officials and members of the women's union in Jagang Province visited the Rangrim Revolutionary Battle Site, those in South Hamgyong Province the Sinhung Area Revolutionary Battle Site and those in Ryanggang Province the Sinpha Revolutionary Site.
					
					 They held diverse political and cultural events including a concert, meeting on greatness and a contest of singing revolutionary songs in chorus while marching in array.

articles.title: Wreaths and Floral Baskets Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Wreaths and Floral Baskets Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Wednesday, the 97th anniversary of her birth.
					 Seen before the bust was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Phyong Hae, O Su Yong, and vice-premiers, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA, working people and school youth and children in Pyongyang.
					
					 Laid before the bust were wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA, institutions of education, public health and media, a joint national organization of the Korean Children's Union, party and power organs and factories in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the bust, recollecting the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the bust to pay tribute to it on the same day.
					
					 Laid before her statues in Kim Jong Suk County, Hoeryong City and at Kim Jong Suk Naval University and Kim Jong Suk General Military Academy on the same day were floral baskets in the name of local party and power bodies, working people's organizations and units of the KPA and the KPISF, factories, enterprises, farms and schools, and bouquets.

articles.title: Undying Feats Performed by Kim Jong Suk for National Reunification
articles.content:
Undying Feats Performed by Kim Jong Suk for National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- All the people and servicepersons of the DPRK are recollecting with deep emotion the great feats performed by Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, for national reunification on the occasion of her 97th birth anniversary (December 24).
					 National reunification was her lifetime desire.
					
					 From the early days of national division forced by outside forces after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, she worked heart and soul to put into practice President Kim Il Sung's idea of national reunification.
					
					 It was one day in April Juche 37 (1948) that she met the south Korean women participants in the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea held in Pyongyang.
					
					 After praising them for their righteous struggle in south Korea, she told them that the conference was of great significance in rallying all fellow countrymen around Kim Il Sung, foiling maneuvers for "separate election and separate government" sought by the U.S. imperialists and separatists and building a reunified sovereign state. And she called on them to make joint efforts to achieve the national reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk had also paid deep attention to bringing up the rising generations to be the pillars of the national cause of independence, while taking warm care of their living.
					
					 She devoted herself to rallying all the women into a powerful force capable of carrying forward the struggle for independent reunification.
					
					 The undying feats she performed for national reunification will be always remembered by the Korean people.

articles.title: New Technology Applied to Production of Sintered Expanded Vermiculite
articles.content:
New Technology Applied to Production of Sintered Expanded Vermiculite
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Architectural Engineering Branch under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has recently established a new economic method of producing sintered expanded vermiculite.
					 It was hard to produce good-quality sintered expanded vermiculite by the existing methods, which need much consumption of anthracite in its production.
					
					 The researchers of the branch developed a new technology of calcinating vermiculite to raise the quality of sintered expanded vermiculite and thus, established a new production process.
					
					 The new method cuts away fuel consumption by 30 percent and volume weight per unit by 40 percent.

articles.title: More Facts about Japanese Imperialists' Forcible Drafting of Koreans Disclosed
articles.content:
More Facts about Japanese Imperialists' Forcible Drafting of Koreans Disclosed 
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean committee for surveying damage caused by forcible mobilization and for supporting victims of forcible mobilization abroad during the anti-Japanese resistance opened to public data proving the Japanese imperialists' forcible drafting of Koreans on Dec. 21, according to Seoul Sinmun of south Korea.
					 It was reported that the data, the list of Koreans whom the Japanese imperialists had taken to Sakhalin, was worked out by the Japanese imperialist police and was taken from a professor of the University of Foreign Studies of south Korea who had once visited the State Sakhalin archives of Russia.
					
					 Recorded in the data are the names of more than 6 200 Koreans who were taken to Sakhalin for compulsory labor and their domiciles, birth dates, features, characteristics, etc.
					
					 Disclosing the data, a person concerned of the organization said that the number of Koreans who were taken to Sakhalin was estimated to be 30 000, and it is the first time that the list worked out by Japan was opened to public.

articles.title: Wooden Sculpture Presented to Kim Il Sung by Polish Figures
articles.content:
Wooden Sculpture Presented to Kim Il Sung by Polish Figures
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- On display at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK is a wooden sculpture "Eagle" presented to President Kim Il Sung by a delegation of the Warsaw Group for the Study of the Juche Idea from Poland in August Juche 94 (2005).
					 At that time, the delegation was on a visit to the DPRK to attend the celebrations to mark the 60th anniversary of Korea's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule (August 15). 
					
					 The group, which had presented gifts to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on several occasions, has propagated the Juche idea through its website.
					
					 Seen on the lower part of the gift are English letters "Poland" with the national emblem of Poland above them.
					
					 When conveying the gift to an official concerned, the head of the delegation said that the gift represents profound reverence for Kim Il Sung, the founder of the Juche idea who always lives in the hearts of the Polish people and other progressives of the world.

articles.title: KPA Taking Lead in Building Thriving Nation (1)
articles.content:
KPA Taking Lead in Building Thriving Nation (1)
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean People's Army (KPA) has fully displayed its might as the vanguard fighter in devotedly defending the leader, the defender of the country as well as the creator of people's happiness under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Especially, in the general advance of the Songun (military-first) revolution led by Marshal Kim Jong Un in the new century, the KPA have further demonstrated its revolutionary nature and militant mettle by taking the lead in building a thriving nation.
					
					 It is the greatest feats performed by the KPA that it has reliably safeguarded the lifeline of the Juche revolution under the uplifted banner of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 On January 1, Juche 101 (2012), Kim Jong Un inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA, declaring his will to invariably carry on the Songun revolution together with servicepersons. In response to his will, the servicepersons of the KPA Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces held a rally to vow to firmly carry forward the tradition of the Paektusan army.
					
					 In March 2013, the U.S. had become evermore reckless in its moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK, pulling up it over its satellite launch for peaceful purpose and self-defensive underground nuclear test. But the KPA answered the U.S. war moves with such practical military measures, an expression of its firm will to defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of its supreme leadership, as ordering all strategic forces and field artillery corps to hold the No. 1 battle position.
					
					 It also took merciless physical counteraction against the leaflet scattering conducted by traitors to the Korean nation in the area along the Military Demarcation Line in October this year. 
					
					 The KPA has stood in the van in the struggle to uphold the monolithic leadership of the WPK with loyalty and creditably defend the revolutionary tradition of Juche.
					
					 It was well evidenced by those songs like "Revolutionary Armed Forces Upholds Leadership of Marshal Only" reverberated throughout the country.
					
					 Meetings of KPA servicepersons including the 1st Meeting of Airpersons, the 4th Meeting of the Company Commanders and Political Instructors and the 3rd Meeting of Battalion Commanders and Political Instructors served as occasions to manifest their will to invariably uphold the Party's leadership without slightest deviation.
					
					 This year, a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu made by the commanding officers of the KPA combined units marked an important occasion in successfully carrying forward the tradition of Mt. Paektu and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Exploits
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Exploits
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the Korean revolutionary armed forces on Dec. 24, Juche 80 (1991), a manifestation of their profound respect for and trust in him, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial.
					
					 His Songun revolutionary exploits serve as the eternal treasure for the Workers' Party of Korea, revolution, country and nation, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 His Songun revolutionary exploits not only contain all ideas, theories, strategies and tactics and a wealth of experience to be applied to the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S. and general advance for building a thriving nation but also provide political, military, economic and cultural foundations for the everlasting dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 He provided the Songun idea. This occupies the most important and brilliant place in his Songun revolutionary exploits.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun idea the Juche-oriented course of the Korean   revolution has remained unchanged even a bit for the past three years and neither difficulties nor ordeals could block its advance.
					
					 It was Kim Jong Il who made journeys of indefatigable Songun revolutionary leadership hard to find in the history of any great man, cherishing the revolutionary faith, grit and fighting spirit that victory should be won through generations.
					
					 Great unity between the army and people -- this was achieved thanks to his energetic leadership through which he set forth the revolutionary soldier spirit as symbol and representative of the Songun era, the new era of the Juche revolution, as required by the developing revolution, and led the whole society to follow the spirit.
					
					 The party, army and people in the DPRK are proud to have great revolutionary exploits surely guaranteeing the lasting prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary cause of Juche is making steady progress under the outstanding and tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Chairman of Joint Chiefs of Staff's Outbursts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Chairman of Joint Chiefs of Staff's Outbursts 
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Choe Yun Hui, puppet chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea, ceaselessly toured the joint security area of Panmunjom, frontline posts in the western sector of the front, radar base of the puppet air force, etc. making such bellicose remarks as crying out for demonstrating "punishing ability and will" and "overpowering the north" in case of its provocation. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says that what Choe uttered only provokes derision.
					
					 What he did only reflects the uneasy mentality of the south Korean puppet group which has committed so many crimes, it says, adding:
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are shaking with towering resentment at the south Korean puppet forces who took the lead in the U.S.-led anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, and they are always highly alerted to wipe out them. Seized with extreme uneasiness and terror, Choe made an inspection of the forefront area in a bid to bolster up the sinking morale of the puppet soldiers and fan up war hysteria.
					
					 The DPRK would like to warn once again Choe Yun Hui against his reckless tongue-lashing, not aware of where he stands.
					
					 He had better be careful about his tongue-lashing, if he does not want to perish in the flames he recklessly kindled. Flurry of outbursts let loose by him only touch off resentment among all our service personnel and people. This is as foolish an act as precipitating the puppet group's self-destruction.
					
					 Even their master U.S. can never protect the puppet forces from the merciless fire of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.

articles.title: With No Rhetoric Can Japan Deny Sexual Slavery: Minju Joson
articles.content:
With No Rhetoric Can Japan Deny Sexual Slavery: Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Some days ago the chairman of the Foreign Relations Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives reportedly said that history had evident records on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, adding that the  Japanese government's denial of the coercion involved in recruiting "comfort women" was just the same as the Nazis' denial of Holocaust.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says this is a common view of the international community that Japan's sexual slavery was a hard fact and as hideous as the Nazis' Holocaust.
					
					 The paper goes on:
					
					 Even a political heavyweight in the U.S. took a negative approach towards Japan's wrong attitude towards the past crimes, suggesting a lot of things.
					
					 It is self-evident that as long as Japan wrongly approaches its past crimes, the international community will become increasingly critical of it and it will find itself in a more difficult position.
					
					 Japan should bear this in mind.
					
					 Japan's attitude towards the past crimes is not merely a matter of history but an issue directly related to its destiny.
					
					 Japan is denying both its destiny and future by denying its crime-woven history and past. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to stop such a foolish act.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Puppet Group of Suppressing Progressive Forces
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Puppet Group of Suppressing Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- It is south Korea today where violence is rampant in the absence of politics.
					 Recently the Unified Progressive Party (UPP), a legitimate political party, was forcibly disbanded and five lawmakers from the party were deprived of their membership of the "National Assembly" in south Korea.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, puppet chief executive of south Korea who has regarded the UPP as a thorn in her flesh since she took office, prodded the "constitutional court" into deciding on the dissolution of the party in just 30 minutes on Dec. 19. The next day she termed it a "historic decision which firmly protected liberal democracy."
					
					 This is nothing but hideous politically-motivated terrorism, a repetition of the nightmare dating back to the era of dictatorship.
					
					 A terror-ridden atmosphere that had prevailed under "yusin" fascist dictatorship in the last century is now threatening the people in south Korea under the reign of the worst woman tyrant. 
					
					 While desperately working to cook up a fascist "law on disbandment of criminal organizations and the like," the Park group is invoking the ill-famed "Security Law" for cracking down upon righteous personages struggling for national reconciliation and unity and social democracy. 
					
					 The UPP's case is a typical example of the outrageous act of unhesitatingly disbanding those political parties and organizations which incur the displeasure of the regime.
					
					 When the attempt of the Park group to unseat the lawmakers from the UPP in the "National Assembly" through election rigging proved futile, the Park group cooked up a "pro-communist case" charging that Ri Sok Gi, lawmaker from the party, attempted a rebellion.
					
					 The conservative forces claimed that the programme of the UPP is similar to the "north's Juche idea" and its aim and activities have followed the "same way as the north's." 
					
					 These conservative forces have come out with daggers in their hands, prompted by their sinister purpose to isolate and stamp out the UPP spearheading the anti-"government" actions and, furthermore, divide and weaken all progressive forces.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime's on-going politically-motivated suppression reminds one of the evil deeds perpetrated by the "yusin" dictator.
					
					 After the bloody military coup, traitor Park Chung-Hee forcibly disbanded 23 political parties and 238 social organizations in less than a week, arrested, jailed and killed a lot of patriotic people in south Korea. He promulgated various "proclamations" and evil laws to legalize the establishment of his military dictatorial system and to preserve and round it off.
					
					 He reinforced such repressive bodies as the CIA, covered the whole of south Korea with a dense network of police forces and agents and cooked up a series of spyring cases including the case of the People's Revolutionary Party and the case of the National Democratic Youths and Students League by perpetrating murderous tortures and conspiracy. He brutally suppressed the patriotic parties and public organizations aspiring after independence, democracy and reunification and mercilessly killed pro-reunification and pro-democracy personages and people from all walks of life, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere throughout south Korea.
					
					 Now that the progressive UPP was disbanded by the conservative remnants of "yusin" this time, one can hardly tell who will be their next target.
					
					 But history is fair.
					
					 The miserable end of the ferocious "yusin" dictator taught a serious lesson. 
					
					 The puppet group, finding itself in the worst ruling crisis, is making desperate efforts to escalate confrontation with compatriots in the north. However, its days are numbered as it has committed such indelible crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive's Moves for "Eliminating Followers of North" Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive's Moves for "Eliminating Followers of North" Denounced
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on Dec. 16 accused the puppet chief executive of her call for "eliminating followers of the north".
					 At the meeting of chief secretaries on Dec. 15 Park Geun Hye talked about "social contradictions" while labeling a lecture on reunification given by Sin Un Mi, a Korean professor in the U.S., as an "activity following the north," the editorial recalled.
					
					 "Social contradictions" touted by Park amount to distortion of truth by insulting the lecture and to a terrorist act of throwing inflammables to a peaceable lecturer, it noted.
					
					 Nevertheless, Park is suppressing Sin by branding her as an architect of "contradictions", it charged.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive Indicted for Insulting Lectures on Reunification
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Chief Executive Indicted for Insulting Lectures on Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Hwang Son, representative of the Forum for the Study of Politics Desired of south Korea, Monday filed a suit in the prosecution against the puppet chief executive on charges of libel and abuse of position as she malignantly slandered lectures on reunification by labeling them as the "those following the north".
					 Some days ago, Hwang together with Sin Un Mi, a Korean professor in the U.S., gave lectures on reunification where they told about the impressions of their visit to the DPRK in the past.
					
					 Displeased with this, the puppet chief executive at the meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae on Dec. 15 branded their lectures as the "ones following the north", claiming that some personnel who visited the north caused trouble as they distorted and exaggerated facts about the north.
					
					 Hwang condemned Park's remarks concerning the "forces following the north" as an abuse of position as it set the orientation of the prosecution's investigation.

articles.title: Undemocratic Action of S. Korean Puppet Forces Denounced
articles.content:
Undemocratic Action of S. Korean Puppet Forces Denounced 
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification released a statement on Dec. 20 in protest against the puppet forces' disbandment of a progressive political party.
					 The statement branded the disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) by the Park Geun Hye regime as an anachronistic and undemocratic action.
					
					 The "constitutional court" made the decision on disbanding the party, charging that progressive democracy set by the UPP as a programme was in violation of the "basic democratic order", the statement said, adding:
					
					 Just are the activities of the UPP to establish a democratic government in which toiling people would become masters, and to achieve independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 It accused the "constitutional court" of labeling the activities conducted by the UPP as actions for overturning social system.
					
					 The recent decision was a tyrannical action tailored by the regime.
					
					 Saying one can hardly repress indignation at the recent crude violation of democracy, the statement stressed that the ill-fame the judges earned by taking the decision to please the regime will be always be recorded in the history of the violation of democracy.

articles.title: Terrorist Act against S. Korean Progressive Activists Slammed
articles.content:
Terrorist Act against S. Korean Progressive Activists Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a statement on Dec. 15 in demand of a strict punishment of criminals who committed a terrorist act against Hwang Son, representative of the Forum for the Study of Politics Desired, and Sin Un Mi, a Korean professor in the U.S.
					 The terrorist act against progressive activists was cooked up by the anti-reunification forces fanning up the madcap confrontation with fellow countrymen, the statement said.
					
					 The recent crime was not a simple accidental act of a student of a high school, it noted.
					
					 The "yusin" dictatorship is being revived and ultra-right terrorist forces are rampant in south Korea, it deplored.
					
					 It demanded a clear probe into the accomplices and backstage manipulators of the terrorist act and stern punishment of those concerned in it.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted by Czech Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Posted by Czech Political Party on Its Website
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was posted by the Czechoslovak Communist Party on its website on Dec. 16.
					A portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il was also posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Indonesia
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in pamphlet by the Hekadaha Printing and Publishing House of Indonesia on Dec. 16.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), says that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the revolutionary cause in the DPRK to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The pamphlet in its preface praises the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il all his life and says that his exploits would shine forever as the most precious legacy guaranteeing the victory of the Korean-style socialist cause and accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 It notes that socialist Korea would always emerge victorious as it is led by Kim Jong Un who is holding aloft the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 12.
					 The work, published on April 27, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the land management and indicates the general orientation and tasks to be fulfilled to face-lift the land as befitting the appearance of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Figures
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in the DR Congo, Finland and Sweden on Dec. 13 and 15 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the DR Congo who doubles as chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said that Kim Jong Il's whole life was the one of a patriot who devoted his all to the country and its people.
					
					 He stressed that progressive mankind would always remember Kim Jong Il who added shine to the era of Juche and the era of independence with his outstanding political caliber.
					
					 Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for developing in depth the Juche idea into the great guiding idea of the era of independence and defending Korean socialism by dint of Songun and bringing about a turning phase of building a thriving nation. Kim Jong Il was, indeed, a genius of thought and theory who aroused and led the popular masses to victory by dint of ideology, they added.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, stressed that peace and security could be ensured on the Korean Peninsula and the Korean people could more dynamically push forward the economic construction thanks to Kim Jong Il's great Songun idea and the self-defensive nuclear deterrent provided by him.
					
					 Messages and letters to Marshal Kim Jong Un were adopted at the seminars.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Jong Il Will Shine Forever: Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Jong Il Will Shine Forever: Foreign Newspapers
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries carried special write-ups on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Qatar newspaper The Peninsula on Dec. 13 carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un. It also carried an article entitled "DPRK honors memory of HE Kim Jong Il, peerless patriot."
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK, performing the undying feats, the article said, and went on:
					
					 With his energetic ideological and theoretical activities he illuminated the way ahead of the Korean revolution, turned the DPRK into a world-level military power and won only victories in the drive for defending socialism.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK never forget the forced march of field guidance provided by him snowy or rainy and day and night.
					
					 HeKim Jong Il made great contributions to the cause of Korea's reunification and peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Namibian newspaper New Era on Dec. 12 carried a special write-up titled "On third anniversary of demise of Chairman of National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a portrait of his beaming image.
					
					 It said that the feats he performed for the country, the revolution and the cause of global independence will shine forever.
					
					 An Angolan newspaper on Dec. 12 devoted one whole page to an article titled "We pay respect to the great leader of DPRK HE Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a portrait of his beaming image and a photo of Kimjongilia.
					
					 It said that the army and people of the DPRK are thoroughly carrying out the last instructions of Kim Jong Il with deep yearnings for him.

articles.title: Nigerian National Committee for Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism Meets
articles.content:
Nigerian National Committee for Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism Meets
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- An annual general meeting of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism took place in Abuja on Dec. 16.
					 The meeting reviewed the activities conducted by the committee this year and discussed its action program for 2015.
					
					 Speakers vowed to intensify activities for the study and dissemination of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in 2015 which will mark the 70th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea and Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed for Korea's Reunification Praised by Beninese Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed for Korea's Reunification Praised by Beninese Political Figure
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, issued a statement on Dec. 15 lauding the feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il for Korea's reunification.
					 Kim Jong Il's formulation of the three charters for Korea's reunification was one of his contributions to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation's struggle for the country's reunification, Ali Houdou said, and went on:
					
					 He wisely led the struggle to realize the three charters for Korea's reunification.
					
					 Thanks to his courageous decision prompted by his broad magnanimity and patriotism the north-south summits, the first of their kind in the history of Korea's division, were provided and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, were adopted and made public.
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification proved that peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the world can be ensured only when the north-south relations advance under the three charters for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin fully supports the three charters for Korea's reunification, regarding it as the immortal great programme indicating the way of Korea's reunification.
					
					 We extend invariable solidarity to the Korean people dynamically advancing for the country's reunification under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, lodestar of Korea's reunification and tender-hearted father of all the Koreans.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported by Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Third anniversary of demise of Chairman of National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" on its website on Dec. 14 on the occasion of the anniversary.
					 The article said:
					
					 Three years have passed since demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This period witnessed the Korean people's strong yearnings and noble moral obligation towards him.
					
					 The Korean people are glorifying his feats, holding him in high esteem as the eternal chairman of the NDC.
					
					 They are bringing about great changes by stepping up the dynamical drive for carrying out his last instructions in all fields.
					
					 Key projects now under way in the DPRK including the construction of power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River and the creation of stock-breeding base in Sepho area are all aimed to realize his lifetime plan and desire.
					
					 It is the fixed will of the Koreans to perfectly carry out all the instructions given by him.
					
					 Seeds for prosperity sown by him are now bearing fruits in the DPRK.

articles.title: Brazilian Figure Denounces U.S. "Human Rights" Offensive against DPRK
articles.content:
Brazilian Figure Denounces U.S. "Human Rights" Offensive against DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, made public a statement on Dec. 15 in denunciation of the U.S. "human rights" offensive against the DPRK. 
					 He recalled that the U.S. perpetrated such grave political provocation as railroading the "human rights resolution" against the DPRK through the meeting of the Third Committee of the 69th UN General Assembly on November 18 by manipulating its followers and threatening those countries which do not meet its demand through its highhanded practices and political and economic pressure. 
					
					 Very prejudiced is the "report of the Commission of Inquiry (CI)" on the human rights situation in the DPRK which was cooked up on the basis of materials presented by the U.S. and in the joint name of some EU countries and Japan, he said, and went on: 
					
					 All the materials contained in the "report" were provided by the south Korean puppet authorities. 
					
					 The ultimate purpose of the U.S. is to tarnish the image of socialist Korea and stir up hostility toward it in the international community, put south Korea under control with nuclear weapons and implement its policy of interference in the internal affairs of socialist Korea. 
					
					 That was why many countries opposed the U.S.-sponsored anti-DPRK "human rights resolution".
					
					 After railroading the "human rights resolution" against the DPRK through the meeting of the Third Committee of the 69th UN General Assembly, the U.S. is persistently pressurizing the UN organizations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Uganda
						
 Pyongyang, December 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Uganda on Dec. 17.
					 The work, published on Nov. 1, Juche 83 (1994), explains the idea that Korean-style socialism based on Juche-oriented theory of socialism is the most scientific and vital one and indicates principled issues arising in defending socialism. 
					
					 The booklet in its preface says that all African progressives should follow the Juche idea and struggle to achieve the final liberation of Africa on the basis of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, crystallization of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Palacio de Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Palacio de Sol Kumsusan 
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del significativo dia 24 de diciembre, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos acogen el 23o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del EPC.
					
					El Mariscal entro en el hall donde se hallan las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino dio saludo a los Generalisimos.
					
					Seguidamente, fueron colocados al pie de las estatuas un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal y el otro a nombre del EPC.
					
					Junto con los participantes, el Mariscal rindio el postumo homenaje a los Generalisimos ante sus estatuas.
					
					A continuacion, entro en el salon de eternidad donde esta conservado el cuerpo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Volvio a rendirle homenaje junto con los participantes y paso revista a los vagones de tren, los carros usados por los Generalisimos, el hall de llantos, la sala de conservacion de las ordenes del Dirigente, el coche electrico y el barco usados por el.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong, Kim Jong Gak, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song y otros miembros de mando del EPC y otros de las unidades de tipos de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo del EPC.

articles.title: Cuadros rinden homenaje a Generalisimos en Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden homenaje a Generalisimos en Palacio del Sol Kumsusan 
						
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 23o aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado y los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 24 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan. 
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il estaba colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Tambien se veia un cesto de flores a nombre del EPC. 
					
					Fue depositado un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el CDN, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron el sublime homenaje a los Generalisimos ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos. 
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes, los halles de llantos, las salas de conservacion de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren usados por los Generalisimos hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas para las visitas de orientacion y los viajes al extranjero.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia cartas de agradecimiento a Ri Hui Ho y Hyon Jong Un
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia cartas de agradecimiento a Ri Hui Ho y Hyon Jong Un
						
Kaesong, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio las cartas de agradecimiento a Ri Hui Ho, viuda del ex presidente surcoreano Kim Dae Jung, y Hyon Jong Un, presidenta del Grupo Hyundai, quienes enviaron ofrendas florales  y mensajes de condolencias con motivo del 3o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il . 
					El secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yang Gon, las entrego el dia 24 en Kaesong al director del Centro de Paz Kim Dae Jung, Kim Song Jae y a  la presidenta del Grupo Hyundai, Hyon Jong Un, respectivamente.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia carta de agradecimiento a Ri Hui Ho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia carta de agradecimiento a Ri Hui Ho
						
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 18 una carta de agradecimiento a la senora Ri Hui Ho, viuda del ex presidente surcoreano Kim Dae Jung.
					En la misiva, el remitente expreso profundo agradecimiento a la destinataria por el envio de una ofrenda floral preparada con devocion y un mensaje de condolencias con motivo del 3o aniversario del deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Refirio que durante el duelo nacional de hace 3 anos, ella visito a Pyongyang con sus hijos y nueras para expresar condolencias ante el feretro del difunto Presidente de CDN y esta vez, envio una ofrenda floral y un mensaje de condolencias, lo que es su expresion de la noble obligacion moral al Presidente del CDN.
					
					Subrayo que en su vida, el Presidente del CDN Kim Jong Il recordo a menudo que ella dedico todo lo suyo junto con el ex presidente Kim Dae Jung a la causa por la nacion y la reunificacion.
					
					Enfatizo que en acato a la noble voluntad de reunificacion y la causa de toda la vida de los maximos dirigentes antecesores, se esforzara en el futuro tambien por realizar el deseo nacional sobre la reunificacion.
					
					Expreso la esperanza de que en un buen tiempo del ano proximo, ella visite sin falta a Pyongyang para descansar y pasar dias agradables.
					
					Deseo que ella tenga especial cuidado con el frio de estos dias invernales.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia carta de agradecimiento a Hyon Jong Un
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia carta de agradecimiento a Hyon Jong Un
						
Pyongyang, 24 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 18 una carta de agradecimiento a la presidenta del Grupo Hyundai, Hyon Jong Un.
					En su misiva, el remitente senalo que esta agradecido por el envio de la ofrenda floral preparada con devocion y un mensaje de profundas condolencias con motivo del 3o aniversario del deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Enfatizo que cuando nuestro pueblo estaba entristecido por el gran duelo nacional, la senora expreso condolencias ante el feretro del difunto Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional.
					
					Subrayo que al enviar esta vez una ofrenda floral y un mensaje de condolencias, la senora expreso su voluntad de apreciar y continuar las estrechas relaciones establecidas entre el Presidente del CDN y el ex presidente honorario del Grupo Hyundai, Jong Ju Yong, y su ex presidente, Jong Mong Hon.
					
					Puntualizo que toda la nacion no olvidara nunca las conductas patrioticas de los senores Jong Ju Yong y Jong Mong Hon, registradas en el camino por la nacion y la reunificacion.
					
					Deseo que  la presidenta logre siempre exitos en sus trabajos.
					
					Asevero que si la presidenta visita en el futuro Pyongyang le dara bienvenida.
